editor: visual

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, results = FALSE}
library(meetupr)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Past and Upcoming Events

### Johannesburg R User Group

```{r, echo = FALSE}
urlname <- "Joburg-R-Users-Group"
events <- get_events(urlname)
dplyr::arrange(events, desc(time)) %>%
  filter(status %in% c("PAST", "published")) %>%
  top_n(5,time) %>% 
  #filter(time >= today() %m+% months(-6) & time <= today() %m+% months(6) ) %>%
  #add_column(event_type = "Johannesburg R User Group" ) %>%
  mutate(title = cell_spec(title, "html", link = link)) %>% 
  select(title, time, venue_name) %>%
  kable("html", escape = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
